title: Rakan and Xayah Gifting Icon
body: When Rakan{{champion:497}}  and Xayah{{champion:498}}  were gift able, I gifted Rakan to my friend. I am just wondering when I'm supposed to receive the icon for that, It's been a couple weeks and I still haven't received it, Thanks for your help.

replies.body:
I'm so excited to have seen so many summoners take advantage of the gifting event we had for that precious couple ^_^!

Fret not if you haven't gotten your icon quite yet. Even though the event ended on Apr 26th, the icons are still being sent out over the next week. If you still don't have yours by about March 10th, then hit us up in a ticket and we'll get it taken care of!
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

EDIT: **MAY 10th**, I done goofed up my months xD
I'm glad I'm not the only one who mixes up March and May :D
omfg I said it here too XD! Thank you guys for calling me out and keeping me on my toes lol ^_^!
I also haven't received my icon for gifting Rakan yet

@Broporo 10th May still not there :( Giftet Xayah 2x and Rakans 3x with IP and also played with Rakan and a premade which played Xayah in a normal blind pick. (before promotion end) 

Help plz :3

it takes upto TWO weeks AFTER the event end date for all the icons to be received.

if after two weeks you still did not receive them, then send in a ticket.
